title: Cant login for 2 weeks now
body: still cant login to NA and still no fix after weeks of waiting so sad.....

replies.body: Are you getting any errors while trying to login?  Are you on the legacy or updated client?  I'd like to help but need some more specifics!

cant login to both and only NA i sent a ticket long ago seems only my main account is affected but i can play in Oceania is there anyway i can change my main account to Oceania? as that seems to be the only way i can play
